title: Disclosure
context: [ยง480B-2] Disclosure. (a) The media shall submit to the attorney general, no later than thirty days after December 31 of the reporting year, an income tax return filed pursuant to section 235-4. (b) Any media filing an annual income tax return pursuant to subsection (a) shall also furnish to the attorney general, in forms and at times that the attorney general deems necessary or expedient in the interest of the general public, special or supplementary reports covering information disclosed in subsection (a). &copy; Any report submitted pursuant to subsection (a) or (b) shall be a public record for the purposes of chapter 92F. [L 1995, c 243, pt of ยง2]
